pageProduct.name: Scholl Eulactol Heel Balm Gold 120ml Twin Exclusive Pack
pageProduct.description:
Information

Cracked heels occur when the thick skin on the sole of the foot becomes dry and is more prone to cracking. Eulactol Heel Balm Gold is a moisturising balm that softens and hydrates the skin. It effectively restores rough, dry and cracked skin.

Smoothes, softens and hydrates the skin on the heel of the foot

Eulactol Heel Balm has been dermatologically tested

Works in 7 days with visible results in just 3 days

Clean and dry feet

Smooth product onto the heel of the foot

Massage product into the heel of the foot until fully absorbed

Apply twice daily and continue to use as necessary to maintain condition

General Information

Scholl Eulactol Heel Balm Gold works in 7 days with visible results in 3 days.

Scholl Eulactol Heel Balm Gold.


Effectively restores rough, dry and cracked skin.


Works in 7 days with visible results in 3 days.


Smooths, softens and hydrates.


- Fragrance-free.


- Dermatologically tested.


- Clinically proven.


- Non-greasy.


How & When should I use it?


Apply twice daily to clean, towel dried skin. Smooth onto feet and massage in until fully absorbed. Once the skin is restored, continue to use as necessary, to maintain condition.

Suitable For: Rough, Dry and Cracked Skin

Size: 2 x 120mL

Fragrance Free?: Yes

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to open, bleeding or infected cracks. If local irritation or rash occurs discontinue use.
Keep out of reach of children.

CAUTION

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to open, bleeding or infected cracks. If local irritation or rash occurs discontinue use.
Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Scholl and diabetes:
Please seek advice before use if you have diabetes as your foot condition may require treatment by a healthcare professional.


Ingredients

Aqua, Urea, Dimethicone, Decyl Oleate, Petrolatum, Lanolin, Dicocoyl Pentaerythrityl Distearyl Citrate, Cera Microcristallina, Glyceryl Oleate, Paraffin, Panthenol, Aluminium Stearate, Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Sodium Phosphate, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Bisabolol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sorbitol, Methylparaben, Butylparaben, Ethylparaben, Propylparaben, Isobutylparaben, Faex, BHA, Citric Acid.

Directions

How & when should I use it?
Apply twice daily to clean, towel dried skin. Smooth onto feet and massage in until fully absorbed. Once the skin is restored, continue to use as necessary, to maintain condition.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C
